content.text: As of the latest available data, the market capitalization of Astrotech Corp is $X million.
Astrotech Corp's valuation metrics can be compared to industry benchmarks to assess its relative value. Some relevant valuation ratios include:

PE Ratio measures the price investors are willing to pay for each dollar of earnings generated by a company. Comparing Astrotech Corp's PE Ratio to industry benchmarks will provide insights into its valuation.
PS Ratio compares the price of a company's stock to its revenue. By comparing Astrotech Corp's PS Ratio to industry benchmarks, we can evaluate its market value.
PB Ratio compares a company's market value to its book value. Assessing Astrotech Corp's PB Ratio compared to industry benchmarks will indicate its valuation in relation to its assets.
Dividend Yield measures the return on investment through dividends. As Astrotech Corp may or may not pay dividends, comparing its dividend yield to industry benchmarks will highlight any differences.

EPS represents the portion of a company's profit allocated to each outstanding share of common stock. Comparing Astrotech Corp's EPS to industry benchmarks will provide insights into its profitability per share.

By analyzing the market capitalization, valuation metrics, and relevant ratios of Astrotech Corp stock compared to industry benchmarks, it will be possible to gain a better understanding of its relative value in the market.
